alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 4:49AM EST until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by prior excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Gallia. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Several roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 444 AM EST, emergency management reported multiple roads closed due to high water in the warned area. Flooding continues to occur in some locations. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gallipolis, Rio Grande, Gallia, Crown City, Adamsville, Gage and Centerpoint. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
